{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = 0627-zero3 (11).png |image1_size = 300px |caption = Open-source Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.orangepi.org/html/hardWare/computerAndMicrocontrollers/details/Orange-Pi-Zero-3.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Orange Pi |model = OPI Zero |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 3 (4G) |revision = V1.2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/06/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Orange_Pi_Zero_3 |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H618; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Zbit Semi;ZB25Q128ASIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = 792 MHz |ram1size = 4 GiB |ram1chip = Rayson;RS1G32LO4D2BDS-53BT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Motorcomm;YT8531C; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2021.07;orangepi; |stockos = Linux;6.1.31;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (non-standard connector), Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI 2.0a |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C) Female
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI 2.0a, Bluetooth 5.0, CVBS, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP313A;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = orangepi |defaultpass = orangepi |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Shenzhen Xunlong |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Ubuntu, Debian, Android 12, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2023 |estprice = 29 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0C9ZZKNL4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Cdtech 20U5622 |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Allwinner;AW859A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H618 @1.5GHz Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-G31 MP2'', supports OpenGL ES 1.0/2.0/3.2 *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4 @792MHz) SDRAM *Onboard Storage: 16MB (SPI) Flash, :TF card (max. 128GB) / MMC card slot *Wi-Fi: [[Allwinner]] AW859A (1T1R) SDIO, :802.11abgn/ac + BT 5.0, UART/PCM BT *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB 2.0 (OTG Type C) ports :2x USB 2.0 ports via optional expansion board *Power: 5V/3A via USB Type C
==Links of Interest== *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Xunlong_Orange_Pi_Zero3 ''Xunlong Orange Pi Zero3'' on '''Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/orange-pi-launches-low-cost-zero-3-board/ ''Orange Pi launches low-cost Zero 3 board'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/07/03/orange-pi-zero-3-allwinner-h618-sbc-ships-with-up-to-4gb-ram/ ''Orange Pi Zero 3 Allwinner H618 SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/xunlong/xunlong_orange_pi_zero3 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = sunxi |subtarget = cortexa53 |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
